------------------------------------------------------------
I propose this...
Last 2 MBTI Letters & First 2 Functions Formula Theory
*I WILL ADD MORE TO THIS LATER, AND REFINE/CLEAN UP Just posting for now.​
Here in all these tables I will propose and attempt to demonstrate why it is more important to go off of a hybrid combination of top function orders & last two mbti letters while factoring in compatibility in interactions, or factoring how all types interact similar and different. RATHER than using logic like switching out F & T or simply pairing oppositional sides. I will further update and expand how all of these pairings for every type with measurable numbering of commonalities and the orders can ALL be a pro or con. And how the roles more so define Enneagram and what us as individuals need in other people when it works, as well as when it does not work. As far as a theory.
*I/E is NOT lumped in because it is of little consequence in the large picture if you have a basis of the bulk personality and know if you prefer I or E etc then you would still utilize the same process just picking which ever complimented you best.
This chart in no way attempts to account for outside things like character, physical attraction, and lifestyles. It is simply a theory that this is a better basis to base things off of than simply black and white thinking like saying reverse a T & P with F & J to make a match. As that is just logically not cohesive really when factoring in Functions, Letters, & JP. By looking at all of this one can see where they would fall for any type depending on their frame of mind, needs, enny, etc.
